title: WASM FFmpeg Video Converter
stack:
Vue 3 & Nuxt 3

Vue 3 | Nuxt 3 | Docker | AWS App Runner
description: Convert video formats and strip or extract audio with FFmpeg and WebAssembly directly in your browser. No data upload - everything is done locally. Supports files up to 2GB.
